thread.title: Dom Cristelli to Lead Sales at Velosio

author: cnbc.com
title: Dom Cristelli to Lead Sales at Velosio
text:
COLUMBUS, Ohio, Feb. 22, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Velosio is pleased to announce and welcome Dom Cristelli as the company's Vice President of Sales. Cristelli will be responsible for sales team leadership, driving revenue, delivering an exceptional client experience, as well as general executive leadership.
Cristelli joins Velosio from Tribridge/DXC, where he most recently served as the National Sales Leader for the company's Customer Sales Strategy. A seasoned technology sales and business development consultant with over 25 years of experience, Dom is dedicated to helping clients leverage the Cloud, take advantage of best industry practices and have a great client experience. Dom's expertise includes Cloud Solutions, system requirement analysis, solution design, business process consulting, packaged software selection and project management across a variety of industries, including manufacturing, distribution, professional services and the public sector.
"I am thrilled to be part of the Velosio team. My entire career has been spent in the technology industry and I recognize the business platform of clients, partners, technologies and subject matter experts that Velosio is building is special. We are very excited about the unique value we will be delivering to our clients," stated Dom Cristelli.
James Bowman, Velosio Chairman of the Board and Chief Revenue Officer states, "Velosio's business platform is all about redefining the client experience and Dom's energy is a terrific addition to our team. His history of delivering performance gains for companies like ours speaks for itself. Not only will he bring a tighter focus on the client's experience with our sales team, but also be a terrific addition to our executive management team".
Dom began his career as a controller and subsequently worked for several years as a technology consultant helping mid-sized and enterprise businesses evaluate and implement ERP and CRM solutions. He later founded his own company, Meridues Technologies, which was ultimately acquired. Dom is a member of the Society of International Business Fellows. He holds a Bachelor of Business Arts degree in Accounting with a minor in Computer Sciences from Niagara University.
About Velosio
Velosio has emerged as a leader in deploying business applications through the transformational cloud and delivering a client experience that is second to none. Among the largest Microsoft partners in North America, Velosio supports the entire Microsoft Dynamics portfolio, Office 365 family and Azure services. The solutions portfolio, inclusive of ERP, CRM, Productivity and Business Intelligence, extends to Sage and NetSuite. Velosio is the only Microsoft Cloud Distributor that specializes in Dynamics 365 and is a prominent Microsoft Master VAR. Headquartered in Columbus, Ohio, Velosio serves over 4,000 clients from more than 40 offices in the US and Canada.
